bonus.description: Przyznaj lub zabierz bonusowy XP użytkownikowi lub wszystkim użytkownikom z daną rolą.

member.description: Użytkownik, którego bonus XP ulegnie zmianie.

change.description:
Ilość XP przyznawana użytkownikowi.
Nie może być wartością ujemną.

role.description: Change the bonus XP of all members with a given role

change.description: The amount of XP to give to each member with the role. This option may be negative.

use-beta.description: Enables the beta method of giving bonus to roles. Warning: will not send levelUpMessages.

id.description: The ID of the channel to modify

levels.description: Set assign/deassign levels for a role.

id.description: The ID of the role to modify.

assign-level.description: The level a member must be at to gain this role.

deassign-level.description: The level a member must be at to lose this role.

menu.description: Launches a menu to modify role settings.

id.description: The ID of the role to modify.

entries-per-page.description: Set the number of entries per page in embeds sent by the bot.

value.description: The number of entries per page.

cooldown.description: Change the message and vote cooldowns.

message.description: The time between messages that can count for XP.

vote.description: The time members must wait between upvotes.

set.description: Open a menu to configure server settings.

bonustime.description: Start bonustime for a specified duration.

time.description: The time for the bonustime to last, in minutes.

levelfactor.description: Set your server's levelfactor. The levelfactor controls how quickly levels scale in difficulty.
The levelfactor to use in the server.

xp-per.description: Set the amount of XP gained from each source.

message.description: The amount of XP gained per message sent

voiceminute.description: The amount of XP gained per minute spent in VC

vote.description: The amount of XP gained per upvote

invite.description: The amount of XP gained per member invited to the server

bonus-xp-per.description: Set the amount of bonus XP gained from each source while bonustime is active.

message.description: The amount of XP gained per message sent during bonustime

voiceminute.description: The amount of XP gained per minute spent in VC during bonustime

vote.description: The amount of XP gained per upvote during bonustime

invite.description: The amount of XP gained per member invited to the server during bonustime

faq.description: Display a list of Frequently Asked Questions.

help.description: Show information for operating the bot.

inviter.description: Set a member as your inviter.

member.description: The user that invited you to the server.
The member to show information about.
The specific version to show. Defaults to the latest version.

rank.description: Find your or another member's rank

member.description: The member to check the rank of.

reset.description: Reset your server or members in your server.

server.description: Reset some statistics of the entire server.

statistics.description: Reset one or more types of statistic for the entire server.

all.description: Reset all server settings, XP, and statistics.

deleted.description: Reset statistics for deleted channels or members.

id.description: The ID of the channel to reset.

channels.description: Reset the statistics of all deleted channels.

members.description: Reset the statistics of all members that have left the server.

top.description: Show the top members and channels in the server.
